pages.text: The wand is a necessary tool for synthesizing and controlling some spirit products. Right-clicking blocks with the wand can select them, and right-clicking again can cancel the selection. The number of blocks that can be selected increases with the increase of mana value, and up to 128 blocks can be selected at most. Sneaking and right-clicking can cancel all selections.
Using the wand with selected blocks to right-click on an artificial life will transfer the selected blocks to the artificial life, activating it to cast spells on those blocks.
Using the wand without selected blocks to right-click on an artificial life will allow the artificial life to cast spells on individual blocks in a specific direction.
The maximum distance is 8 blocks in the direction the artificial life is facing.
